mean_cn: n.（精神上的）紧张，不安；紧张局面
mean_en: a feeling of nervousness that makes you unable to relax; a situation in which people do not trust each other, or feel unfriendly towards each other, and which may cause them to attack each other
sentence: The writer is feeling great tension because of the coming deadline.
sentence_trans: 截止日期就要到了，这位作家十分紧张。
word_etyma: tens=tense拉紧的，紧张的 + ion状态 → 紧张
